_comment1: machineId: Unique identifier for this machine (get from control server dashboard)
_comment2: agentToken: Secure token for agent authentication (generate a strong random string)
_comment3: controlServer: URL of your AtlasNode control server (without trailing slash)
_comment4: port: Port for agent HTTP server (default: 7777)
_comment5: heartbeatInterval: Interval in milliseconds to send heartbeat to control server (default: 60000 = 1 minute)
